ygData.subject: Re: Infecticon tricks(ATTN: All of Darkfates Troops and Airly)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, you know what? I dont really want to continue taking place and patience from our coRPers here. Make a topic if ya want. And besides, why dont we ask for

From: "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@...>

Okay, you know what? I dont really want to continue taking place and 
patience from our coRPers here. Make a topic if ya want. And besides, why 
dont we ask for airly's opinion?


>From: Legendarynemasis@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Infecticon tricks(ATTN: All of Darkfates Troops and Airly)
>Date: Sat, 21 Jul 2001 01:15:20 -0000
>
>The test that Blacknightmare was given was supposed to be a ONE SHOT
>DEAL. You pass it and get remade or you fail it and die. When airly
>had Darkfate agree to the bet which Blight explained the conditions
>of in detail, she accepted the fate of the charachter whatever it
>was. It would not be IC if the Infecticons did not carry out with the
>punishment for failing the test.
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > That's what I mean. You condemn her to death. I think you don't
>have to. If
> > airly wants to get her killed, then alright never mind what I said,
>but I
> > dont think you have to impose death anyways on her. I dont know she
>should
> > get out of there, and sincerely, that's not my problem. I mean,
>just be
> > fair!
> >
> >
> > >From: Legendarynemasis@a...
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >Subject: Re: Infecticon tricks(ATTN: All of Darkfates Troops and
>Airly)
> > >Date: Sat, 21 Jul 2001 00:38:46 -0000
> > >
> > >Its not supposed to end until she dies. The Infecticon test was
>meant
> > >to be a pass or fail thing. If you fail you die. It was established
> > >before the bet was made between the two. Darkfate and Airly had the
> > >choice to decline, but they didnt. I was actually expecting
> > >Blacknightmare to pass anyways. But she failed the test and that
> > >price is death. Also, how can she get out of the situation if you
> > >mind my asking? Shes under water in a very large facility. The only
> > >transport on and off can be activated by the main computer which
>can
> > >only be activated by the infecticon signature and brain waves. Not
>to
> > >mention the facility is heavily armed and can be sealed off to
> > >prevent escape.
> > >
> > >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
>wrote:
> > > > Well there's something else. I hate to say it though, I guess
>I'll
> > >end up
> > > > sounding like you lokking for mode everywhere =P. From what I
>made
> > >out, the
> > > > way you're going, the battle won't stop until Blacknightmare
>dies.
> > >That, to
> > > > me, is very abusive. There's no way you should decide that
>another
> > >player's
> > > > char has no way to get out of a situation.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > >From: Legendarynemasis@a...
> > > > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > > >Subject: Re: Infecticon tricks(ATTN: All of Darkfates Troops
>and
> > >Airly)
> > > > >Date: Fri, 20 Jul 2001 23:59:45 -0000
> > > > >
> > > > >Because is is basically a hologram. It is and it isnt there.
> > >however
> > > > >the thing is battling the same thing of Blacknightmare. The
> > >hologram
> > > > >of the bamphomet cant be hurt however, whatever damaged that
>the
> > > > >blacknightmare hologram recieves it is duplicated by the pod
>to her
> > > > >body. When the final test was given all three were holograms.
> > > > >
> > > > >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > >wrote:
> > > > > > Then why was it called hologram all the way long?
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > >From: Legendarynemasis@a...
> > > > > > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > > > > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > > > > >Subject: Re: Infecticon tricks(ATTN: All of Darkfates
>Troops
> > >and
> > > > >Airly)
> > > > > > >Date: Fri, 20 Jul 2001 11:46:58 -0000
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >it isnt a hologram thing. Blacknightmare is in a simulation
> > >type
> > > > > > >thing where hjer body is actually in a capsule of sort.
> > >Whatever
> > > > > > >happens to her body in the simulation, happens to her in
>the
> > >pod.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > LN, if your holo is attacking Blacknightmare, then I
>suggest
> > > > >that
> > > > > > > > you re-post. Though it's not in the rules (Yan forgot to
> > >add it
> > > > > > >in),
> > > > > > > > holograms are images, and cannot do damage.
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > On 19 Jul 2001, at 20:55, Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > The simulation Hellpeon smirked as it flew forward at
> > > > > > >Blacknightmare
> > > > > > > > > and slashed at her with its Chaochitan energy sword a
>few
> > > > >times
> > > > > > >before
> > > > > > > > > launching another large Chaochitan energy at
> > >Blacknightmare.
> > > > >For
> > > > > > >her
> > > > > > > > > there was no other escape from here except death, thus
> > >was the
> > > > > > >penalty
> > > > > > > > > for failing the test. Meanwhile Blight simply smirked
>at
> > > > >Darkfate
> > > > > > >and
> > > > > > > > > then turned and headed towards one of the walls.
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > Blight: "They will work. Or you will die. As far as I
>can
> > >see
> > > > >its
> > > > > > >a
> > > > > > > > > win-win situation for me."
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > With those words Blight walked through a new opening
>in
> > >the
> > > > >wall
> > > > > > >that
> > > > > > > > > sealed itself right back up after he left. He was now
>once
> > > > >again
> > > > > > >in
> > > > > > > > > the main control room of the complex, and soon a
> > >transmission
> > > > >was
> > > > > > > > > opened to all of Darkfate's troops, their frequency
>was
> > >also
> > > > > > > > > discovered when Blacknightmare was scanned. He
>chuckled
> > > > >somewhat
> > > > > > > > > before his message played over the comm lines of every
> > >single
> > > > > > >member
> > > > > > > > > of Darkfates men.
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > Blight: "This is Blight, of the Infecticons, your
> > >commander,
> > > > > > >Darkfate
> > > > > > > > > is now our prisoner. If you do not do as we say, we
>shall
> > >kill
> > > > > > >him.
> > > > > > > > > You are all to stop with whatever you are doing and
>are to
> > > > >come
> > > > > > >to the
> > > > > > > > > location of this transmission. You will recieve
>further
> > >orders
> > > > > > >from me
> > > > > > > > > then. If you need a landmark... just hover over the
>big
> > > > > > >whirlpool."
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > Blight laughed to himself as he then pressed another
> > >button.
> > > > >Back
> > > > > > >in
> > > > > > > > > the part of the base Alecto was in, an anti gravity
>device
> > > > > > >activated
> > > > > > > > > beneath her and sent her flying out of the chamber and
> > >back to
> > > > > > >ledger
> > > > > > > > > and co. At that point the whirling water vortex
>greatly
> > >shrank
> > > > > > >leaving
> > > > > > > > > only a small entry point down to the same sealed off
> > >section
> > > > >of
> > > > > > >the
> > > > > > > > > base. And still at the bases' center a massive hole
>was
> > >now
> > > > >in the
> > > > > > > > > ground but all within the hole was metal and
>electronics
> > > > >beneath
> > > > > > >that.
> > > > > > > > > And still the nanites continued to build down deeper
>into
> > >the
> > > > > > >already
> > > > > > > > > seemingly bottomless thing.
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > Blacknightmare/Darkfate::
> > > > > > > > > >
